cause.description:
Kalakendra is a nonprofit, tax-exempt organization formed in February 1987 and incorporated in the State of Oregon.
www.kalakendra.org
1. introduce, promote and enhance awareness of the various performing arts of the Indian subcontinent
2. support education of performing arts of India
3. support dissemination of Indian classical music
cause.mission: To introduce, promote and enhance awareness of the various performing arts of the Indian subcontinent through presenting concerts, classical dances, recitals and lecture demonstrations.
cause.name: Kalakendra
